page.title: 13HOW WE HELP OTHERS
page.content: At our school we have competitions to raise money for people who are less fortunate than us. We sponsor two children in the Bible lands. We need to send them over Â£100 a year to send them to school and to buy them clothes. The money also goes to the Ethiopians to buy them food, drink and clothes. At the moment we are having a car washing fortnight and people may sponsor us. We estimate that the whole school may have raised over Â£100 already! The money goes to the Church of England Children's Society to send handicapped children on holiday. Part of the competition was to wash the most unusual vehicle. Some of the children from our class washed H.M.S. Illustrious and six children washed a field gun from the D Day museum. Another group washed a submarine. Everyone can help.{Cara and Helen}
